message: I get out of bed and leave my room.
In the hall, I notice someone sitting on the stairs.
Before I have the chance to speak, he turns.

name: 紅雀
message: "Yo."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yo. What're you doing here?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Nothin' in particular."
I walk down the stairs and sit on the step just above him. The lights are off, so it's pretty dark.

name: 紅雀
message: "Truth is, I wanted to take a walk, but couldn't decide where to go. So I sat down and sorta just lost track of time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Something on your mind?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I guess you could say that. What's with you? Couldn't sleep?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I mean, with everything that's happened..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, you really found yourself a whole lotta trouble."

name: 紅雀
message: "First Ruff Rabbits, then that weird guy in the gas mask, then the real kicker: Scratch coming out of the woodwork."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, no, I didn't mean it like that. I wasn't trying to give you shit, I just..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Like, with all the stuff Tae was talking about earlier, I'm just worried about you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know. I know I make you worry..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Wait, I didn't mean it like that either... It's just, you know, you've always had so much to deal with."

name: 紅雀
message: "And I always used to think... maybe talking about it―even if it's dumb―might take some of that weight off your shoulders."

name: 紅雀
message: "But you've always been like this, as long as I've known you. Not sayin' that's a bad thing."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's not, but I can't read your mind. I won't know what's wrong if you don't say something. So I gotta keep asking until you open up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't beat yourself up over what happened to Mizuki. ...I guess that's easier said than done, though."

name: 紅雀
message: "But if you really need someone to blame for what happened, lay it on me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks, man."
Koujaku is trying to cheer me up. I'm grateful for his concern.
He glances back at me like he wants to say something, but ruffles his bangs instead.

name: 紅雀
message: "That power of yours... Scrap, right? It doesn't change the way I think about you."

name: 紅雀
message: "I have to admit I was a little... surprised... to find out you used to do Rhyme, though."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I really did forget. I wasn't trying to hide it from you."

name: 紅雀
message: "I know. I've known you long enough to know when you're lying. Not that you're bad at it. I just know you too well."

name: 紅雀
message: "Coming down on you for it wouldn't make sense, anyway. You're suffering more than anyone because of this shit. We just have to do what we can."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks."
He lets out a little sigh and smiles.

name: 紅雀
message: "We're breaking into Platinum Jail, right? Something bad's pretty much guaranteed to happen."

name: 紅雀
message: "You should get some sleep. Even a little. Alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good idea. I'll try. But you need rest too."

name: 紅雀
message: "That's the plan. Don't you worry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, night."

name: 紅雀
message: "Night."
I get up and head back to my room.
I feel a little more relaxed. Talking to Koujaku helped.
I need to focus on moving forward, and that'll require my full attention.
Maybe, when we get to Platinum Jail, I might learn something that could help save Mizuki.
I lie down and close my eyes, determined to get as much rest as I can. My friends are counting on it.
